metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12872 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The (1) Htpasswd authentication source in the authcrypt module and (2) SimpleSAML_Session class in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.11 and earlier allow remote attackers to conduct timing side-channel attacks by leveraging use of the standard comparison operator to compare secret material against user input.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12872` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.14.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
